Source.Name: raqm
Source.Summary: A library for complex text layout
Source.Description: Raqm is a small library that encapsulates the logic for complex text layout. It currently provides bidirectional text support (using FriBiDi), shaping (using HarfBuzz), and proper script itemization. As a result, Raqm can support most writing systems covered by Unicode.
